name: VOX-MD
description: A modern WhatsApp bot built with Node.js and Baileys MD, featuring powerful automation and fun features.

PREFIX.description: Set the bot's command prefix to avoid errors and confusion.

DEV.description: Enter the bot owner's phone numbers without + or spaces, separated by commas (e.g., 254114018035,254741889898).

CODE.description: Enter your country code without + (e.g., 254 for Kenya). This enables the bot to detect and manage foreign numbers.

STICKER_AUTHOR.description: Set the author name for stickers.

BOTNAME.description: Set the name of your bot.

GC_PRESENCE.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to show fake recording/typing in group chats.

SESSION.description: Paste your WhatsApp session ID obtained after linking the bot. Required for authentication.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to automatically view all status updates.

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to automatically like status updates. (Requires AUTOVIEW_STATUS to be 'true').

ANTIDELETE.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to forward deleted messages in groups to your private chat. (Private chats not supported yet).

ANTILINK.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to remove users who send links in groups.

EVENTS.description: Set to 'true' to allow the bot to detect group events like promotions, demotions, additions, and removals. It will send welcome and goodbye messages accordingly.

AUTOBIO.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to automatically update its bio.

ANTITAG.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to remove members who use '@everyone' or 'hidetag' excessively.

ANTIVIEWONCE.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to automatically unlock view-once media.

AUTOREAD.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to automatically mark private messages as read.

WA_PRESENCE.description: Set the bot's WhatsApp presence status: 'typing' (typing...), 'recording' (recording...), 'online' (always online), or leave blank for real presence status.

MODE.description: Set to 'private' if you want only the owner to use the bot, or 'public' for everyone to access it.
